Get raw bin code of float in memory.

Example output:
```
   0.000 -> 0 00000000 00000000000000000000000
   0.125 -> 0 01111100 00000000000000000000000
   0.250 -> 0 01111101 00000000000000000000000
   0.375 -> 0 01111101 10000000000000000000000
   0.500 -> 0 01111110 00000000000000000000000
   0.625 -> 0 01111110 01000000000000000000000
   0.750 -> 0 01111110 10000000000000000000000
   0.875 -> 0 01111110 11000000000000000000000
   1.000 -> 0 01111111 00000000000000000000000
   1.125 -> 0 01111111 00100000000000000000000
   1.250 -> 0 01111111 01000000000000000000000
   1.375 -> 0 01111111 01100000000000000000000
   1.500 -> 0 01111111 10000000000000000000000
   1.625 -> 0 01111111 10100000000000000000000
   1.750 -> 0 01111111 11000000000000000000000
   1.875 -> 0 01111111 11100000000000000000000
   ```
